entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 20 early this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
